author: schor
msg: [UIMA-1756] add a new dir: parent-poms as a node collecting all the parent poms, under this - so they can all be checked out at once. (all under a common trunk/tags/branches)

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-1756] rename to a higher concept - and put parent-poms as a node collecting all the parent poms, under this - so they can all be checked out at once. (all under a common trunk/tags/branches)

author: vhennebert
msg: Generate event models in the same directory as the corresponding EventProducer interfaces and name it event-model.xml by default
The eventResourceGenerator task now takes a destination directory parameter instead of modelfile

author: trawick
msg: make_sock() sets lr->listen on success, so no need to set
